com.gensym.util
Class Helper

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.lang.Thread
        |
        +--com.gensym.util.Helper
public class Helper
extends Thread

This class runs a Helper thread to do what the client wants to do. Use this if you have to complete a task synchronously but don't want to hold up the current thread (it may be called out of the UI.

Method Detail

run

Overrides:
run in class Thread

cleanup

public void cleanup(Exception e)
A method to cleanup after any exceptions that might occur during the method call. Note that Errors and other Throwables are not caught and forwarded. The default implementation simply prints a stack trace of the point of throw and for the call that spawned the Helper. Subclasses should feel free to override this behaviour and / or do specific cleanup tasks.
